definition: A state of urgency or pressure caused by limited time available to complete a task or meet a deadline. It is commonly used to describe the stress or strain experienced when time constraints are present, often in work or academic contexts.

examples.english: The time pressure makes me nervous.
We need to reduce the time pressure.

examples.german: Der Projektmanager setzt uns unter Zeitdruck.
examples.english: The project manager puts us under time pressure.
We work more efficiently under time pressure.
